documentation.text:
@title OracleXMarketFactory
 @notice Creates markets (as OracleXVault instances) and keeps registry.
@notice Create a new market and its vault
@notice For API compatibility; market address maps to its vault (vault itself here)

@title OracleXOracleAdapter
 @notice Minimal adapter receiving final outcomes (mocked Chainlink) and settling vaults.

@title OracleXVault
 @notice USDC vault managing YES/NO pools and post-settlement withdrawals.
@notice Deposit USDC into YES(1) or NO(0) pool
@notice Operator allocation based on probability; first call locks vault.
@notice Settle market and enable withdrawals for winners.
@notice Withdraw pro-rata share of losing pool plus principal on winning side after settlement.

@title OracleXVerifier
 @notice Stores AI commitment hashes for markets. Future hook for zkML proofs.
@dev Optional IPFS CID storage for human-readable explanation blob
@notice Retrieve optional IPFS CID for a market

@title MockChainlinkOracle
 @notice Simple test harness: backend calls this; it forwards to adapter.

@title MockUSDC
 @notice Minimal ERC20 with 6 decimals used for testing and demo.
